hero.title1: Kayan Aikin Samar da Takarda na AI
hero.title2: Samar da Takardun Ilimi a Cikin Daƙiƙa 30
hero.description: Ka shigar da taken ka, ka zabi samfuri, AI zai samar da cikakken takarda mai tsari na Word/PDF

coreFeatures.subtitle: Muhimman Ayyuka
coreFeatures.title: Samar da Takardun Ilimi da Sauri
coreFeatures.description: Ko kana bukatar aikin darasi, takardun kammala karatun ko labarin mujallar ilimi, za mu iya biyan bukatar ka

inputSection.title: Shigar da Bukatun Takardarka
inputSection.placeholder: Misali: Ka samar da takarda game da amfanin AI a fannin kiwon lafiya, tare da taƙaitawa, gabatarwa, binciken da suka shafi, misalai na amfani da kuma ƙarshe, bai ƙasa da kalmomi 5000 ba...
inputSection.tip: Cikakken bayani zai samar da mafi kyawun sakamako

coreFeatures.costTip: Samarwa guda ɗaya yana buƙatar maki 1 · Ana goyan bayan sauke Word/PDF

preview.title: Kallon Takarda
preview.emptyTitle: Ka shigar da kalmomin jagora ka zaɓi samfuri
preview.emptyDescription: AI zai samar maka da cikakken takardun ilimi

features.subtitle: Fasalolin Ayyuka
features.title: Me yasa za ka zaɓi Kayan Aikin Samar da Takarda namu

speed.title: Samarwa Mai Sauri
speed.content: Samar da cikakken takarda a cikin daƙiƙa 30. An horar da AI da bayanan ilimi na kwararru don tabbatar da ingancin abun ciki

plagiarism.title: Ingantaccen Binciken Sace
plagiarism.content: Tsarin binciken sace na ilimi da aka gina ciki don tabbatar da asalin takarda. Yana da damar kwatanta da manyan ma'ajin bayanan ilimi

templates.title: Samfura na Kwararru
templates.content: Samfura na ilimi sama da 50 da suka rufe kowane fanni. An tsara su a hankali bisa ga ka'idojin ilimi

student.name: Dalibi Ahmad
student.content: Bayan na fara amfani da wannan kayan aiki, ingancin rubuta takardoyi ya haɓaka har sau uku! Ɓangaren nazarin wallafe-wallafen ya fi dacewa

professor.name: Farfesa Maryam
professor.content: Na ba da shawarar ga ɗalibai su yi amfani da wannan kayan aiki wajen yin farkon rubutu, yana taimaka musu su fahimci tsarin takardun ilimi

researcher.name: Mai Bincike Yusuf
researcher.content: Lokacin shirya takardun tararon ƙasa da ƙasa, wannan kayan aiki ya taimaka min samar da farkon rubutu da ya dace da tsarin IEEE da sauri

cta.title: Gwada Samar da Takarda ta AI Yanzu
cta.description: Yi rajista ka sami maki 5 kyauta, ka samar da farkon takardarka ta AI kyauta

footer.slogan: Mafi kyawun kayan aikin samar da takarda ta AI, don tallafawa binciken ilimi da haɓaka ingancin rubutu
